events.name: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania, December 2023
events.wd_label: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania, December 2023
events.wd_description: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania have resulted in at least 47 deaths and 80 injuries, with widespread destruction of property and livelihoods, exacerbated by higher-than-usual rainfall in the region.
events.description: Severe flooding and landslide in northern Tanzania have resulted in at least 47 deaths and 80 injuries, with widespread destruction of property and livelihoods, exacerbated by higher-than-usual rainfall in the region.

events.name: Heavy rainfall in Tanzania
events.wd_description: Northern Tanzania experienced higher-than-usual rainfall, leading to severe flooding and landslides across several regions, including the capital Dar es Salaam.
events.description: Northern Tanzania experienced higher-than-usual rainfall, leading to severe flooding and landslides across several regions, including the capital Dar es Salaam.

events.name: Flooding and landslides
events.wd_description: The flooding and landslides in northern Tanzania resulted in at least 47 deaths, 80 injuries, and significant destruction of property, with national security forces deployed for rescue efforts.
events.description: The flooding and landslides in northern Tanzania resulted in at least 47 deaths, 80 injuries, and significant destruction of property, with national security forces deployed for rescue efforts.

events.name: Impact on livelihoods
events.wd_description: Crops were washed away in some parts of Tanzania, affecting the livelihood of the people, with flooding identified as the greatest natural disaster in the country.
events.description: Crops were washed away in some parts of Tanzania, affecting the livelihood of the people, with flooding identified as the greatest natural disaster in the country.

events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: t: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: t: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: t: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: t: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: t: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: t: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: t: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: t: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: China Criticizes US EV Tax Credit Rules
events.wd_label: China Criticizes US EV Tax Credit Rules
events.wd_description: China criticizes Biden administration's plans to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for US EV tax credits, claiming it violates international trade norms and disrupts global supply chains.
events.description: China criticizes Biden administration's plans to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for US EV tax credits, claiming it violates international trade norms and disrupts global supply chains.

events.name: US Tax Credit Rules
events.wd_description: Biden administration plans to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for EV tax credits, targeting more than a trace amount of critical materials from FEOCs.
events.description: Biden administration plans to limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for EV tax credits, targeting more than a trace amount of critical materials from FEOCs.

events.name: t: Tax Credit Criteria
events.wd_description: Investors in the US EV supply chain will be ineligible for tax credits if they use more than a trace amount of critical materials from China or other FEOCs.
events.description: Investors in the US EV supply chain will be ineligible for tax credits if they use more than a trace amount of critical materials from China or other FEOCs.

events.name: t: Implementation Timeline
events.wd_description: The rules will come into effect in 2024 for completed batteries and 2025 for critical minerals.
events.description: The rules will come into effect in 2024 for completed batteries and 2025 for critical minerals.

events.name: China's Response
events.wd_description: China's commerce ministry spokesperson claims the US policy is discriminatory and violates WTO principles.
events.description: China's commerce ministry spokesperson claims the US policy is discriminatory and violates WTO principles.

events.name: t: He Yadong's Statement
events.wd_description: He Yadong criticized the US policy as non-market oriented and warned of its negative impact on EV technologies and the industry.
events.description: He Yadong criticized the US policy as non-market oriented and warned of its negative impact on EV technologies and the industry.

events.name: t: WTO Concerns
events.wd_description: Many WTO members, including China, have expressed concern about the discriminatory nature of the US policy.
events.description: Many WTO members, including China, have expressed concern about the discriminatory nature of the US policy.

events.name: Global Reactions
events.wd_description: The US and European officials are taking action against China's dominance in the global battery supply chain, with the European Commission investigating Chinese subsidies.
events.description: The US and European officials are taking action against China's dominance in the global battery supply chain, with the European Commission investigating Chinese subsidies.

events.name: t: European Commission Investigation
events.wd_description: The European Commission is investigating whether Chinese manufacturers benefit from unfair state subsidies.
events.description: The European Commission is investigating whether Chinese manufacturers benefit from unfair state subsidies.

events.name: t: US Legislation
events.wd_description: The US has passed laws excluding investors from benefiting from tax credits and subsidies if they include FEOCs in their supply chains.
events.description: The US has passed laws excluding investors from benefiting from tax credits and subsidies if they include FEOCs in their supply chains.
